AdvancedConfig.description: This section allows users to tune some system-wide options, either experimental or unsuitable for generic configurations.

alt_operation_matcher.description: Use different algorithm to match Tezos operations (dev only)
alt_operation_matcher.title: alt_operation_matcher

decimal_precision.description: Overwrite precision if it's not guessed correctly based on project models.
decimal_precision.title: decimal_precision

early_realtime.description: Establish realtime connection and start collecting messages while sync is in progress (faster, but consumes more RAM).
early_realtime.title: early_realtime

postpone_jobs.description: Do not start job scheduler until all indexes reach the realtime state.
postpone_jobs.title: postpone_jobs

reindex.description: Mapping of reindexing reasons and actions DipDup performs.
reindex.title: reindex

rollback_depth.description: A number of blocks to keep for rollback (affects all datasources)
rollback_depth.title: rollback_depth

unsafe_sqlite.description: Disable journaling and data integrity checks. Use only for testing.
unsafe_sqlite.title: unsafe_sqlite

watchdog.description: Mapping of watchdog triggers and actions DipDup performs.
watchdog.title: watchdog

AdvancedConfig.title: AdvancedConfig

last_level.description: Level to stop indexing and disable this index
last_level.title: last_level

rollback_depth.description: A number of blocks to store in database for rollback
rollback_depth.title: rollback_depth

EvmTransactionsIndexConfig.description: Index that uses Subsquid Network as a datasource for transactions
EvmTransactionsIndexConfig.title: EvmTransactionsIndexConfig

admin_secret.description: Admin secret of the Hasura instance.
admin_secret.title: admin_secret

allow_aggregations.description: Whether to allow aggregations in unauthenticated queries.
allow_aggregations.title: allow_aggregations

allow_inconsistent_metadata.description: Whether to ignore errors when applying Hasura metadata.
allow_inconsistent_metadata.title: allow_inconsistent_metadata

camel_case.description: Whether to use camelCase instead of default pascal_case for the field names.
camel_case.title: camel_case

create_source.description: Whether source should be added to Hasura if missing.
create_source.title: create_source

hide.description: List of table/view names to make private.
hide.title: hide

hide_internal.description: Whether to make internal tables (prefixed with "dipdup") private.
hide_internal.title: hide_internal

rest.description: Enable REST API both for autogenerated and custom queries.
rest.title: rest

source.description: Hasura source for DipDup to configure, others will be left untouched.
source.title: source

args.description: Mapping of argument names and annotations (checked lazily when possible)
args.title: args

atomic.description: Wrap hook in a single database transaction
atomic.title: atomic

alias.description: Alias for this HTTP client (dev only)
alias.title: alias

batch_size.description: Number of items fetched in a single paginated request (when applicable)
batch_size.title: batch_size

polling_interval.description: Interval between polling requests in seconds (when applicable)
polling_interval.title: polling_interval

ratelimit_period.description: Time period for rate limiting in seconds
ratelimit_period.title: ratelimit_period

ratelimit_rate.description: Number of requests per period ("drops" in leaky bucket)
ratelimit_rate.title: ratelimit_rate

ratelimit_sleep.description: Sleep time between requests when rate limit is reached
ratelimit_sleep.title: ratelimit_sleep

replay.description: Use cached HTTP responses instead of making real requests (dev only)
replay.title: replay

replay_path.description: Use cached HTTP responses instead of making real requests (dev only)
replay_path.title: replay_path

retry_count.description: Number of retries after request failed before giving up
retry_count.title: retry_count

retry_multiplier.description: Multiplier for sleep time between retries
retry_multiplier.title: retry_multiplier

values.description: Values to be substituted in template (`<key>` -> `value`)
values.title: values

args.description: Arguments to pass to the hook
args.title: args

daemon.description: Run hook as a daemon (never stops)
daemon.title: daemon

compatibility.description: Whether to expose resources as tools for clients that don't support MCP resources
compatibility.title: compatibility

immune_tables.description: List of tables to preserve during reindexing
immune_tables.title: immune_tables

update_interval.description: Interval to update some metrics in seconds
update_interval.title: update_interval

ReindexingAction.description:
Action that should be performed on reindexing

:param exception: Raise `ReindexingRequiredError` exception.
:param wipe: Wipe the database and reindex from scratch. (WARNING: This action is irreversible! All indexed data will be lost!)
:param ignore: Ignore the reindexing cause and continue.
ReindexingAction.title: ReindexingAction

ReindexingReason.description:
Reason that caused reindexing

:param manual: Manual reindexing.
:param migration: Migration of the database schema.
:param rollback: Rollback that couldn't be handled automatically.
:param config_modified: Index config was modified.
:param schema_modified: Project models or database schema were modified.
ReindexingReason.title: ReindexingReason

environment.description: Environment; if not set, guessed from docker/ci/gha/local.
environment.title: environment

release.description: Release version; defaults to DipDup package version.
release.title: release

server_name.description: Server name; defaults to obfuscated hostname.
server_name.title: server_name

user_id.description: User ID; defaults to obfuscated package/environment.
user_id.title: user_id

SkipHistory.description:
Whether to skip indexing big map history and use only current state

:param never: Always index big map historical updates.
:param once: Skip history once after reindexing; process updates as usual on the next resync.
:param always: Always skip big map history.
SkipHistory.title: SkipHistory

immune_tables.description: List of tables to preserve during reindexing
immune_tables.title: immune_tables

path.description: Path to .sqlite file, leave default for in-memory database (`:memory:`)
path.title: path

datasources.description: Aliases of index datasources in `datasources` section
datasources.title: datasources

fetch_block_headers.description: Flag signalling that this datasource can be used for block headers fetching
fetch_block_headers.title: fetch_block_headers

rollback_depth.description: A number of blocks to store in database for rollback
rollback_depth.title: rollback_depth

last_level.description: Level to stop indexing and disable this index
last_level.title: last_level

type_registry.description: Path to type registry or its alias
type_registry.title: type_registry

contract.description: Contract to fetch big map from
contract.title: contract

path.description: Path to big map (alphanumeric string with dots)
path.title: path

handlers.description: Mapping of big map diff handlers
handlers.title: handlers

skip_history.description: Fetch only current big map keys ignoring historical changes
skip_history.title: skip_history

code_hash.description: Contract code hash or address to fetch it from
code_hash.title: code_hash

TezosOperationType.description:
Type of blockchain operation

:param transaction: transaction
:param origination: origination
:param migration: migration
:param sr_execute: sr_execute
:param sr_cement: sr_cement
TezosOperationType.title: TezosOperationType

alias.description: Alias for operation (helps to avoid duplicates)
alias.title: alias

optional.description: Whether can operation be missing in operation group
optional.title: optional

source.description: Match operations by source contract alias
source.title: source

strict.description: Match operations by storage only or by the whole code
strict.title: strict

alias.title: alias

destination.description: Match operations by destination contract alias
destination.title: destination

optional.title: optional

source.title: source

optional.title: optional

source.title: source

alias.title: alias

destination.title: destination

optional.title: optional

source.description: Match operations by source contract alias
source.title: source

contracts.description: Aliases of contracts being indexed in `contracts` section
contracts.title: contracts

buffer_size.description: Number of levels to keep in FIFO buffer before processing
buffer_size.title: buffer_size

rollback_depth.description: Number of blocks to keep in the database to handle reorgs
rollback_depth.title: rollback_depth

network.description: Network name, e.g. mainnet, ghostnet, etc.
network.title: network

action.description: Action to perform when watchdog timeout is reached
action.title: action

contracts.description: Mapping of contract aliases and contract configs
contracts.title: contracts

custom.description: User-defined configuration to use in callbacks
custom.title: custom

datasources.description: Mapping of datasource aliases and datasource configs
datasources.title: datasources

hooks.description: Mapping of hook aliases and hook configs
hooks.title: hooks

indexes.description: Mapping of index aliases and index configs
indexes.title: indexes

jobs.description: Mapping of job aliases and job configs
jobs.title: jobs

package.description: Name of indexer's Python package, existing or not
package.title: package

runtimes.description: Mapping of runtime aliases and runtime configs
runtimes.title: runtimes

spec_version.description: Version of config specification, currently always `3.0`
spec_version.title: spec_version

templates.description: Mapping of template aliases and index templates
templates.title: templates
